mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no , prod_name , prod_detail , manufacture_day , price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.nextval , #{prodName} , #{prodDetail} , #{manuDate} , #{price} , #{fileName} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT p.PROD_NO,p.PROD_NAME,p.PROD_DETAIL,p.MANUFACTURE_DAY,p.PRICE,p.IMAGE_FILE,p.REG_DATE,t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN transaction t ON t.prod_no=p.prod_no WHERE p.prod_no= #{prodNo}
